segments.text: Then they are joined by other drummers, and a man on a huge set in the background.

critique: At least two events were missed: (1) the cymbal player and the bassist disappear, leaving only the drummer on the drum set playing; (2) the group of drummers briefly stops while remaining on stage, and by the end only the drum group is playing.

temporal.caption: A man is playing cymbals under a bright light on a stage.
He is joined by a woman on a bass drum.
Then they are joined by other drummers, and a man on a huge set in the background.
Lights flash as they perform in unison.

captions.full: A man is playing cymbals under a bright light on a stage. He is joined by a woman on a bass drum. Then they are joined by other drummers, and a man on a huge set in the background. Lights flash as they perform in unison.
